articles.author: Flavia Cicuttini
articles.title: New research has found an existing drug could help many people with painful hand osteoarthritis - The Conversation
articles.description: Methotrexate is commonly used in Australia and around the world for conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis.
articles.content:
Osteoarthritis is the most common disease of the joints, and often affects the hands. One in two women and one in four men will have symptoms of hand osteoarthritis by the time they turn 85.
